label: ball
caption: The tennis player, her ponytail tied back in a neat bun, crouched low over the baseline, her eyes fixed intently on the approaching ball as she prepared to unleash a powerful forehand. The bright red of her shirt stood out against the lush green grass of the court, and her racket gleamed with a faint sheen of sweat. In this moment, all was quiet except for the soft thud of the ball flying through the air towards its target.
